text: Shafiqul Islam Swapan is a Bangladeshi Cinematographer. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography twice for the films Ghuddi (1980) and Nalish (1982). ==Selected films== * Ghuddi - 1980 * Nalish - 1982 * Chandon Diper Rajkonna - 1984 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Shafiqul Islam Swapan
